overview: Macho Beta is a comedy solo show where VÃ­ctor Medina - Nanutria, a Venezuelan comedian who has shot in several Latin American countries, tells us about his journeys throughout his 30 years. He tells us about his adventures as a migrant and everything he has learned from the different countries he has visited, he also tells us about how difficult it is for a millennial to face adult life and how not all men in the world have the wood to be males alphas reminding us that you can also be a happy beta male.  Comedy special recorded in the city of Buenos Aires in February 2021, taking all the precautions and measures in the health contingency.
title: Macho Beta
